survey_brief: This survey aims to understand consumer preferences and attitudes towards plant-based food products to help businesses better cater to dietary trends.

questions.question_text: How often do you consume plant-based food products?
questions.client_notes: Use a frequency scale to gauge consumption habits. Ensure options cover a broad range.

script.question_text: How often do you consume plant-based food products?

questions.question_text: What motivates you to choose plant-based food products? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Multi-choice question to identify key drivers. Include an 'Other' option for additional insights.

script.question_text: What motivates you to choose plant-based food products? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: Please specify any other motivations for choosing plant-based food products.
questions.routing_logic: Show if 'Other' is selected in Q2
questions.client_notes: Open-ended follow-up to capture unique responses not covered in Q2.

script.question_text: Please specify any other motivations for choosing plant-based food products.
script.routing_logic: Show if 'Other' is selected in Q2

questions.question_text: Which of the following plant-based food products do you regularly consume? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Multi-choice to identify popular product categories. Include 'Other' for completeness.

script.question_text: Which of the following plant-based food products do you regularly consume? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: Please specify any other plant-based food products you regularly consume.
questions.routing_logic: Show if 'Other' is selected in Q4
questions.client_notes: Open-ended follow-up to capture additional product categories.

script.question_text: Please specify any other plant-based food products you regularly consume.
script.routing_logic: Show if 'Other' is selected in Q4

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the taste of plant-based food products you have tried?
questions.client_notes: Likert scale to measure satisfaction with taste.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the taste of plant-based food products you have tried?

questions.question_text: How important is price when choosing plant-based food products?
questions.client_notes: Likert scale to gauge price sensitivity.

script.question_text: How important is price when choosing plant-based food products?

questions.question_text: What improvements would you like to see in plant-based food products? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Multi-choice to identify areas for product improvement.

script.question_text: What improvements would you like to see in plant-based food products? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: Please specify any other improvements you'd like to see in plant-based food products.
questions.routing_logic: Show if 'Other' is selected in Q8
questions.client_notes: Open-ended follow-up to capture additional improvement suggestions.

script.question_text: Please specify any other improvements you'd like to see in plant-based food products.
script.routing_logic: Show if 'Other' is selected in Q8

questions.question_text: Would you recommend plant-based food products to friends or family?
questions.client_notes: Likert scale to measure likelihood of recommendation.
